thread.title: Fantastic location on busy strip of beautiful cafes and restaurants
thread.title_full: Fantastic location on busy strip of beautiful cafes and restaurants - Review of Victoires Opera Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Toni C
title: Fantastic location on busy strip of beautiful cafes and restaurants
text:
Located right in a busy lovely street of cafes, restaurants, shops within walking distance to taxis, metro . Lovely fresh breakfast of pastries, fresh juice every day was available. Request for a pot of tea was no problem. Staff were very helpful in assisting us with travel plans and location of all the highlights we got to see. Easy taxi ride to Monmarte, & Eiffel Tower. Beautiful walks around this location to enjoy the sights and smells of beautiful Paris.Staff arranged our transfer to the airport with no problem. Rooms were small but adequate and serviced daily, very clean , neat and everything that you need.
Room Tip: Our room was located at the back of the hotel which was extremely quiet and not near the lift See more room tips
